name: bo_suggest
description: Bayesian optimization tool that fits a Gaussian Process surrogate on a training dataset and selects top candidates from a separate prediction dataset. Treats all non-response columns as features; categorical features are one-hot encoded; numeric features are scaled. Works purely via the shared db (no external I/O).
data_inputs: train_dataset (string): training data with the response column; predict_dataset (string): candidate rows to score/select; response (string): name of response column in training data.
data_outputs: out_dataset (string): output dataset containing selected candidates with predicted_mean, predicted_std, and acquisition_score.
